analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol:
	Contract Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol#582-600)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

UpgradableToken.upgradeTo (/unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol#536-557) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(_successor,remainingContractBalance) (/unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol#551-555)

Token.fallback uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol#582-600)
	- /unique_contracts/0x2793a23341012e0970cf478bab08606b56504c3e.sol#586-600
